title: One Room Available Astoria Boulevard
posting_body: ['One spacious room available in three bedroom/one bath.', 'Apartment is located on first floor of a private house with quiet and friendly neighbors.', 'Large eat-in kitchen, plus a common area and basement for storage.', 'Several nearby restaurants/bars (with outdoor seating), grocery stores, and laundromats.', 'The apartment is a seven-minute walk from the newly renovated Astoria Boulevard stop on the N/W, from which it’s a 10-minute ride into Manhattan.', 'M60 bus stop steps away, and the M and R trains are also within walking distance (Steinway stop).', '$800/month, heat and hot water included.', 'Utilities run approximately $50/month.', '(less in cooler months).', 'Landlord is nearby and quick to respond for any questions or issues.', 'First month and security deposit (also $800) required before move-in.', 'Move-in date for the room is August 1st.', 'The lease is month-by-month, but would prefer tenants who intend to stay for at least one year.', 'Room features ample closets/storage space, in-room heating, and can comfortably fit a queen-size bed.', 'Unfurnished.', 'I am 29m, currently working from home and in the office as an attorney.', 'I am clean and mostly keep to myself.', 'The second roommate is also 29, she is also clean and mostly keeps to herself.', 'All genders welcome to apply.', 'Looking for kind and respectful roommates.', 'If interested in viewing or learning more, please let us know and tell us a bit about yourself!']
